input.sentences: the annual christmas light show was bigger than ever .
this year some ice sculptures were included .
is n't this adorable ? the fishing boy is made of ice .
meanwhile | my sister was looking at sculptures in a warmer climate .
she and her husband always spend the holidays someplace tropical .
output.sentences: Tom and Jessica went to the winter festival together.
Tom enjoyed the scene of the ice fisherman.
The scene reminded Jessica of the time they made a sand sculpture of Tom in his fishing boat.
Tom and Jessica really enjoyed the winter festival.
